meanings.definition: A pair or combination of two things.
meanings.sent1: The couplement of peanut butter and jelly makes a delicious sandwich.
meanings.sent2: I found a perfect couplement of socks in my drawer.
meanings.sent3: The couplement of a pen and paper is essential for writing notes.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was like a couplement of puzzle pieces, fitting perfectly together.
meanings.sent5: The couplement of salt and pepper adds flavor to the dish.

meanings.definition: The act of joining or uniting two things.
meanings.sent1: The couplement of the two puzzle pieces completed the picture.
meanings.sent2: The couplement of the two rivers formed a larger stream.
meanings.sent3: The couplement of the two magnets was so strong, they couldn't be pulled apart.
meanings.sent4: The couplement of music and dance created a beautiful performance.
meanings.sent5: The couplement of the two colors blended seamlessly on the canvas.
